price: ዛሬማ ከኋላህ ላሉት ተዓምር ትሆን ዘንድ በድን ሆነህ (ከባሕሩ) እናወጣሃለን (ተባለ)፡፡ ከሰዎችም ብዙዎቹ ከተዓምራታችን በእርግጥ ዘንጊዎች ናቸው፡፡
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنۡ خَلۡفَكَ ءَايَةٗۚ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا لَغَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma nunajjīka bibadanika litakūna liman khalfaka āyatan wa-inna kathīran mina al-nāsi ʿan āyātinā laghāfilūna
